title.value: Основные тенденции развития овощеводства в Могилевской области [Беларусь]
The basic tendencies of vegetable growing development in the Mogilev region [Belarus]
The basic tendencies of vegetable growing development in the Mogilev region [Belarus]

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Golovkov, V.A., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were considered the problems of production and supply of vegetables for the population in Mogilev region. Dynamics of indicators of productivity, doses of mineral and organic fertilizers, comparative economic efficiency of cultivation of separate vegetable cultures are analyzed on different categories of enterprises The basic directions of branch functioning are defined on prospect. In view of that vegetables consumption should be uniform within all year, it is necessary: to focus selection of vegetable cultures on creation of the grades keeping useful properties at long storage and concerning steady against adverse weather conditions; to improve the organization of storage of the vegetables which are grown up in an open ground; to keep the tendency of increase in production of vegetables in the protected ground.
